short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add buttons directly next to the time to allow you to swap between speeds and to see how long the video will take at each speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small extension that adds speed change buttons right next to the time and shows how long a YouTube video will be for each respective playback speed.

Usage:
The new times will show up on the normal progress bar, if you click 1.25 once, it will change the speed to 1.25x, if you click it again it will go back to normal speed.
